Description: Upper section of a stone shabti of Padiamenipet with a lappet-wig(damaged), a carved face and ears, an incised collar, crossed hands in relief holding the relief hoes, the waist is inscribed with Chapter 6 of The Book of The Dead in two(surviving) rows of incised Hieroglyphs which almost encircle the body, the back of one arm is decorated with an incised representation of a seed-basket.
